Pre-Game Insights: The Chicago White Sox will face off against the Baltimore Orioles on September 2, 2024.
The White Sox (31-107) are set to take on the Orioles (79-59) in the first of a three-game series.
The Orioles have a 4-0 lead in the season series against the White Sox.
The White Sox have a poor road record of 13-53 and are currently on a 10-game losing streak.
The Orioles have a strong home record of 39-30 and a sixth-ranked team ERA of 3.94 in the American League.
Eloy Jimenez has been a critical player for the White Sox this season.
Corbin Burnes will start for the Orioles, with a 12-7 record and a 3.23 ERA.
Chris Flexen will take the mound for the White Sox, with a 2-13 record and an ERA of 5.29.
The Orioles have a stronger bullpen compared to the White Sox.
